      • gather

        public static <T> T[] gather(Class<T> c,
                             Compare.CompareItem[] items,
                             int n)
        Type Parameters:
        T - the class of the returned array
        Parameters:
        c - the class that will be used to cast the returned elements
        items - a sorted array of Compare.CompareItem
        n - the length of the returned array
        Returns:
        an array of T containing the first n elements of items

      • firstBeyondDeadline

        public static int firstBeyondDeadline(Compare.CompareItem[] items,
                                      double deadline,
                                      boolean biggerIsBetter)
        Parameters:
        items - a sorted array of Compare.CompareItem
        deadline - the deadline
        biggerIsBetter - refer to biggerIsBetter(Alg)
        Returns:
        the index of the first element before the first element whose r value is > deadline if biggerIsBetter(Alg) is false, the index of the first element before the first element whose r value is < deadline if biggerIsBetter(Alg) is true

      • log

        public static boolean biggerIsBetter(AlgMap.Alg alg)
        Parameters:
        alg -
        Returns:
        return true if alg belongs to AlgMap.NormSimAlg. false otherwise
